tasks.label: Build & Run Current C++ File (clang++)
args: clang++ -std=c++17 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX26.0.sdk -I /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX26.0.sdk/usr/include/c++/v1 -stdlib=libc++ -O2 "${file}" -o "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" && "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; echo; read -n 1 -s -r -p 'Press any key to close...'
